alert.note: Alert for Hanover; Henrico; King William; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 9:21PM EDT until June 26 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern New Kent County in east central Virginia... East central Henrico County in central Virginia... Southeastern Hanover County in central Virginia... South central King William County in east central Virginia... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 921 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bottoms Bridge, or near Highland Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Talleysville and Tunstall around 940 PM EDT. New Kent around 955 PM EDT. King William around 1000 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Quinton, Lanesville, Browns Corner, Palls, Cooke, Orapax Farms, Cohoke, Westwood and Rose Garden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Hanover; Henrico; King William; New Kent
